title: North Korea provided Russia with weapons, White House says
description: Intelligence images show what the United States claims are up to 1,000 containers of North Korean ammunition and other war materiel sent to aid Moscow’s war in Ukraine.

title: Have war crimes been committed in Israel and Gaza?
description: The Israeli government and Hamas say they are adhering to international humanitarian law.

title: As Israel pummels besieged Gaza, Egypt resists opening up to refugees
description: Cairo is determined to prevent an exodus of refugees through the Rafah crossing – warning it could be a death knell for the Palestinian dream of statehood.

title: Survivors of Hamas’s rampage in Israel recount the horrors they saw
description: These are the stories of Israelis who survived the Hamas ambush in southern Israel, in their own words.

title: Evacuation order sets off chaotic scramble as Gazans run for their lives
description: The unprecedented Israeli evacuation order, delivered Friday by fliers, voice messages and on social media, has set off a desperate scramble across Gaza.

title: Ukraine hits Russian navy ships with sea drones
description: Ukraine is stepping up attacks on Russian naval assets in the Black Sea using new sea drones.

title: Russia arrests lawyers for imprisoned opposition leader Navalny
description: Alexey Navalny, serving 30 years in a prison colony often communicates with the public only through his lawyers, three of whom have now been detained.

title: Teacher killed in knife attack in France, officials launch terrorism probe
description: A suspect has been detained after a teacher was killed and two people seriously injured in a stabbing at a French high school on Friday.

title: Poland faces a pivotal election. Observers say it isn’t a fair vote.
description: The ruling Law and Justice party, accused by the E.U. of rolling back Poland’s democracy, may have tipped the election odds in its favor.

title: Israel orders million Gazans to evacuate; U.N. says that’s impossible
description: Hamas has told Gaza residents to ignore the Israeli call as “psychological warfare.” Israel accuses the militant group of using civilians as human shields.

title: What is white phosphorus and is Israel’s alleged use a war crime?
description: Human Rights Watch said Israel broke international law by using the chemical in a dense port area. IDF said it was “not aware” of any white phosphorus use in Gaza.

title: What is white phosphorus, which video appears to show Israel using above Gaza?
description: Israel Defense Forces said it was “not aware” of any white phosphorus use in Gaza as Human Rights Watch said video filmed of a strike showed its use.

title: France bans pro-Palestinian protests amid call for Hamas ‘day of rage’
description: France imposed a ban on pro-Palestinian demonstrations after a former Hamas leader called for a “day of rage” on Friday, Oct. 13. Police used tear gas and water cannons on crowds in Paris.

title: How the Israel-Gaza conflict unfolded in maps, graphics and videos
description: This week has brought fear, destruction and uncertainty for millions in the region. Here’s how the events unfolded.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Israel urges 1.1M in north Gaza to evacuate; U.N. warns of ‘devastating’ result
description: The U.N. said the order, which affects nearly half the Gaza population, could “transform what is already a tragedy into a calamitous situation.”

title: As Israel ramps up war with Hamas, backers cheer destruction of Gaza
description: Israel’s leadership and its backers are escalating their rhetoric in calls for punishment and retribution for Hamas’s brutal attack.

title: For American family trapped in Gaza as bombs fall, there’s no way out
description: The family is among a group of about 500 Americans caught in Gaza, according to a U.S. official.

title: Lawmakers echo Israeli rhetoric ahead of Gaza ground offensive
description: A groundswell of congressional support for Israel’s retaliation against Hamas is giving Jerusalem a green light to do whatever it deems necessary.

title: Israel uses white phosphorus in Gaza, video shows
description: The controversial munition, which is commonly used to create smoke to mark targets, can cause severe harm when used against civilians.
